content.question: In the late nineteenth century, state governments in the South were largely successful in restricting

choices.label: African Americans’ voting rights guaranteed by the Fifteenth Amendment
the power of the Democratic Party in the region
state laws allowing married women to own property

content.answer: African Americans’ voting rights guaranteed by the Fifteenth Amendment

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
